name: Crayon Shin-Chan: Arashi wo Yobu Nutte Crayoon Daisakusen
name_original: Crayon Shin-Chan: Arashi wo Yobu Nutte Crayoon Daisakusen
description:
Crayon Shin-Chan: Arashi wo Yobu Nutte Crayoon Daisakusen is an adventure-puzzle game developed by Inti Creates. It came out on 16-11-2007. It was published by Banpresto.
Crayon Shin-Chan: Arashi wo Yobu Nutte Crayoon Daisakusen is available on Nintendo DS.
